message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a mutually beneficial deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I am willing to pay $850000 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $920000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $875000 for the product.
I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $915000, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $890000 for the product.
